description: Integrate related capabilities under parent concepts and organize by business domain. Avoid noun redundancy by nesting related capabilities together, group by business capabilities not technical layers.

do.description: Integrate related capabilities under parent concepts, organize by business domain

guidance.description: Nest related capabilities under a single domain concept instead of creating separate concepts with the same noun
example: Transitions to jump: AnimationClip, CharacterState, JumpTrigger
Blends idle animations: AnimationClip, CharacterState, BlendWeight
(One concept with multiple responsibilities, not separate Walk Animation, Run Animation concepts)

guidance.description: Integrate all related capabilities as responsibilities under a single parent concept
example: Calculates total value across all holdings: Money, Holding, MarketPrice
Evaluates risk score with market conditions: RiskScore, RiskModel, MarketData
Analyzes asset allocation distribution: Allocation, Holding, TargetAllocation

guidance.description: Group concepts around business capabilities and subject areas that collaborate frequently
example: Creates from shopping cart: Cart, Customer
Calculates total with taxes: Money, LineItem, TaxRate
Validates inventory before submission: LineItem, InventoryService
Calculates extended price: Money, Product, Quantity, Discount

guidance.description: Use subject-area nouns when domains are genuinely separate and cannot be integrated
example: Executes attack sequence: CombatAnimation, Target, Weapon
Calculates damage with modifiers: Damage, Target, Weapon, CriticalHit
Calculates velocity with terrain effects: Speed, Terrain, Slope
(Separate concepts because combat and movement are distinct domains)

dont.description: Don't create redundant/fragmented concepts or group by technical layers

guidance.description: Don't create separate concepts with the same noun when they should be integrated under one parent
Don't split related capabilities into separate sibling concepts
example: (Should be integrated into Portfolio as responsibilities)

guidance.description: Don't group concepts by technical layers like Data, Business Logic, Presentation
example: (Should be grouped by Order Management domain)

guidance.description: Don't organize by implementation patterns like Factories, Builders, Repositories
example: (Should be: Order with 'Creates from cart', Trade with 'Creates from recommendation' in respective domains)
